projects.title: Physics Grad Match
projects.subtitle: AI-Powered PhD Program Matching Platform
projects.description: Leveraged AI tools to build web application matching future PhD program applicants to professors using vector similarity search, LLM integration, and full-stack architecture.
projects.extendedDescription: Engineered end-to-end solution combining advanced AI techniques with modern web development. Implemented vector similarity search for intelligent professor-student matching, integrated LLM capabilities for natural language processing, and built responsive full-stack architecture. Features include comprehensive API design, robust database management, sophisticated recommendation algorithms, and polished UI/UX design. Demonstrates proficiency in both AI/ML techniques and software engineering best practices with robust version control and debugging workflows.
projects.impact: AI-powered matching platform connecting PhD applicants with professors using advanced vector similarity and LLM technology
